p: The cytotoxicities of compound 311 were evaluated against the A549 and HepG2 cell lines by the MTT method. Newly isolated compound 311 showed weak activities with IC 50 values of 11.05 µM and 19.15 µM, respectively, against the tested cell lines. Doxorubicin was used as a reference (0.94 µM and 1.16 µM) [ 103].
